title: Mizuki Shigeru no Toono Monogatari
synopsis: An anime movie based on Mizuki Shigeru's manga Mizuki Shigeru no Toono Monogatari .  Toono Monogatari was originally the Japanese folklorist Yanagida Kunio's classical literature based on the oral traditions of Toono city. It's about Yokai such as Tengu, Kappa, and Zashikiwarashi.
